1450260.name: Werewolf: The Apocalypse — Heart of the Forest - Digital Goodies Pack
1450260.description:
Step deeper into the ancient Puszcza with special digital treats for the fans of Werewolf.

This collection of extras contains tons of artwork and behind-the-scenes materials for Werewolf: The Apocalypse — Heart of the Forest, including:

  • Premium wallpapers using the iconic collage style of the game.
  • Player's Guide, which dives into the lore and mechanics of Heart of the Forest as well as its real-life inspirations.
  • Dev Diaries, a series of 14 video interviews with Werewolf's lead designer Artur Ganszyniec, who answers the frequently asked questions about the game.

Discover the secrets long hidden in the ancient wilderness!
